chunk:
Qet Botanicals Hydrating Cleansing Oil with Lavender

Brand: Qet Botanicals

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Bean Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Oil*, Matricaria Recutica (Chamomile) Flower Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil*, Jasminum Sambac (Jasmin
book: 0641-Qet Botanicals Hydrating Cleansing Oil with Lavender

chunk:
minum Sambac (Jasmine) Flower Oil. *Organic Ingredient

Directions: Shake and place a small puddle in the palm of your hand. Massage into skin as much as necessary. Moisten washcloth with warm water and press on to your skin to remove, or add exfoliator before steaming away. Use every evening. There is usually no need to re-cleanse in the morning,
book: 0641-Qet Botanicals Hydrating Cleansing Oil with Lavender

chunk:
nse in the morning, just prepare skin for the serum.

Warnings: If you have a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult with a health professional.
book: 0641-Qet Botanicals Hydrating Cleansing Oil with Lavender
